chapter.title: Reporting Bugs
chapter.para: If you find a bug in Gutenprint or have any suggestions for modification or improvement, please send electronic mail to the Gutenprint bug reporting address, gimp-print-devel@lists.sourceforge.net. Please include the version number, which you can find at the bottom of each manual page. Also include in your message the output that the program produced and the output you expected, if applicable, otherwise the best description of the problem that you can provide.

If you have other questions, comments or suggestions about Gutenprint, contact the developers via electronic mail to the Gutenprint mailing list gimp-print-devel@lists.sourceforge.net. They will try to help you out, although they may not have time to fix your problems.
